id.description: The unique identifier of the user.

@odata.type.description: The type of the Microsoft Graph resource.

businessPhones.description: List of business phone numbers for the user.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

officeLocation.description: The office location of the user.

preferredLanguage.description: The preferred language of the user.

surname.description: The surname (last name) of the user.

userPrincipalName.description: The user principal name (UPN) of the user.
